portfolio.title: Personal Portfolio Webpage
content: Small portfolio website made to showcase personal projects and information about myself.
Front End made using Next.JS, Typescript and Sass

air-ranging.title: Air Ranging Web Application
content: Web application for flight planning, range and fuel calculations, aircraft management and database, user accounts for saving, creating and editing aircrafts and points of interest.
API design in .NET and Entity Framework.
Frontend developed with React, Typescript and Sass.
